requestDepositForBatch((address,address,.details: This method is a workaround that mostly reduce UX for user when deposit token in batch, meanwhile require zero change on the current Gateway code. Logic: - Validate the RequestBatch - `transferFrom` all tokens to this Batcher from user - `requestDepositFor` in the loop for each token, in which:    - each token will be `transferFrom` this Batcher to the Gateway    - `requester` field in the `Request` struct is this Batcher Requirement: - User must `approveAll` tokens for this Batcher - Emit an event that include information of the {RequestBatch}

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

ErrTokenBatchCouldNotTransferFrom((uint8.details: Error indicating that the `handleAssetIn` has failed.

params.tokenInfo: Info of the token including ERC standard, id or quantity.

ErrUnsupportedStandard().details: Error indicating that an unsupported standard is encountered.

requestDepositForBatch((address,address,.notice: Batch transfer token from user to this Batcher, then sequentially request deposit for to gateway on behalf of user.
